mapper.insert: insert into app_info(softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, devId, appInfo, status, flatformId, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, categoryLevel3, logoPicPath, versionId) values(#{softwareName}, #{APKName}, #{supportROM}, #{interfaceLanguage}, #{softwareSize}, #{devId}, #{appInfo}, #{status}, #{flatformId}, #{downloads}, #{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{categoryLevel1}, #{categoryLevel2}, #{categoryLevel3}, #{logoPicPath}, #{versionId} )
mapper.select: select app_info.*, d1.valueName statusName, d2.valueName flatformName, c1.categoryName categoryName1, c2.categoryName categoryName2, c3.categoryName categoryName3,versionNo from app_info,app_category c1,app_category c2,app_category c3,data_dictionary d1, data_dictionary d2,app_version where app_info.appId = #{appId} and c1.categoryId=app_info.categoryLevel1 and c2.categoryId=app_info.categoryLevel2 and c3.categoryId=app_info.categoryLevel3 and d1.valueId = status and d1.typeCode = 'app_status' and d2.valueId = flatformId and d2.typeCode = 'app_flatform' and app_version.appVersionId=app_info.versionId

select app_version.*,data_dictionary.valueName publishStatusName from app_version,data_dictionary where appId = #{appId} and data_dictionary.typeCode='version_publish' and data_dictionary.valueId=app_version.publishStatus
select appVersionId from app_version where appId=#{appId} and versionNo=#{versionNo};
mapper.update: update app_info set softwareName=#{softwareName}, supportROM=#{supportROM}, interfaceLanguage=#{interfaceLanguage}, softwareSize=#{softwareSize}, downloads=#{downloads}, flatFormId=#{flatformId}, categoryLevel1=#{categoryLevel1}, categoryLevel2=#{categoryLevel2}, categoryLevel3=#{categoryLevel3}, status=#{status}, appInfo=#{appInfo}, logoPicPath=#{logoPicPath}, modifyDate=#{modifyDate} where APKName=#{APKName}
update app_version set modifyBy = #{modifyBy}, versionSize=#{versionSize}, versionInfo=#{versionInfo}, apkLocPath=#{apkLocPath}, modifyDate=#{modifyDate} where appVersionId=#{appVersionId}
